WITH v_payment_type AS (
    SELECT *
        FROM OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'payment_type.json',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
            FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
            FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
        )
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
        ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20) 
        )
),

v_taxi_zone AS (
    SELECT
        *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            HEADER_ROW = TRUE
        )
        WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]
),

v_trip_data AS (
    SELECT
        *
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data
)


SELECT *
        -- v_taxi_zone.borough, 
        -- count(1) as total_trips,
        -- SUM(CASE WHEN v_payment_type.payment_type_desc = 'Cash' THEN 1 ELSE 0 ) AS cash_trip,
        -- SUM(CASE WHEN v_payment_type.payment_type_desc = 'Card' THEN 1 ELSE 0 ) AS card_trip,
        
FROM
    v_trip_data
    LEFT JOIN v_taxi_zone
    LEFT JOIN v_payment_type
    ON v_trip_data.PULocationID = taxi_zone.LocationID 
    ON v_trip_data.payment_type = v_payment_type.payment_type_desc
    -- GROUP BY v_taxi_zone.borough, v_payment_type.payment_type
